availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry W. Hieronymus (Mercer County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Herndon Hieronymus in Mercer County, Kentucky, on September 28, 1846. Father of Owen Hieronymus, Caroline Hieronymus, Frank Hieronymus, and Lucy Hieronymus. Married to Kassandra Chenoweth Hieronymus in Mercer County, Kentucky, on November 1,1859. Resident in Mercer County in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Mercer County in 1850. Resident in Mercer County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Mercer County in 1860.
